SELECT AA.EMPNO , AA.EMP_ID , AA.EMP_FLNM , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = AA.JBPS_CD) AS JBPS_NM , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = (SELECT dh.DEPT_ID FROM DEPT_HNF dh WHERE dh.EMP_ID = AA.EMP_ID LIMIT 1) )AS DEPT_NM , AA.TELNO ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM CD WHERE CD_VALUE = AA.HDOF_STTS_CD) AS HDOF_STTS_NM ,IFNULL(BB.CNT,0)AS CNT ,(CASE WHEN BB.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03704' THEN BB.CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PRJ_REJECT ,(CASE WHEN BB.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' THEN BB.CNT ELSE 0 END) AS PRJ_COMPLETE ,IFNULL(CC.SUM,0)AS SUM ,(CASE WHEN CC.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03704' THEN CC.SUM ELSE 0 END) AS MM_REJECT ,(CASE WHEN CC.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD = 'VTW03703' THEN CC.SUM ELSE 0 END) AS MM_COMPLETE FROM EMP AA LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.PRJCT_ID , T1.EMP_ID , T1.APLY_YM , T1.APLY_ODR ,T2.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD, count(1) AS CNT FROM PRJCT_CT_APLY T1 JOIN (SELECT A.PRJCT_ID , A.EMP_ID , A.APLY_YM , A.APLY_ODR, B.PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST_SN, B.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD FROM PRJCT_INDVDL_CT_MM A LEFT OUTER JOIN PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST B ON A.PRJCT_ID = B.PRJCT_ID AND A.EMP_ID = B.EMP_ID AND A.APLY_YM = B.APLY_YM AND A.APLY_ODR = B.APLY_ODR WHERE B.PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST_SN = (SELECT max(PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST_SN) FROM PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST C WHERE A.PRJCT_ID = C.PRJCT_ID AND A.EMP_ID = C.EMP_ID AND A.APLY_YM = C.APLY_YM AND A.APLY_ODR = C.APLY_ODR ) ) T2 ON T1.PRJCT_ID = T2.PRJCT_ID AND T1.EMP_ID = T2.EMP_ID AND T1.APLY_YM = T2.APLY_YM AND T1.APLY_ODR = T2.APLY_ODR AND T1.APLY_YM = #{aplyYm} AND T1.APLY_ODR= #{aplyOdr} GROUP BY T1.PRJCT_ID , T1.EMP_ID , T1.APLY_YM , T1.APLY_ODR ,T2.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD ) BB ON BB.EMP_ID = AA.EMP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT T1.PRJCT_ID , T1.EMP_ID , T1.APLY_YM , T1.APLY_ODR ,T2.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD, SUM(T1.MD) AS SUM FROM PRJCT_MM_APLY T1 JOIN (SELECT A.PRJCT_ID , A.EMP_ID , A.APLY_YM , A.APLY_ODR, B.PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST_SN, B.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD FROM PRJCT_INDVDL_CT_MM A LEFT OUTER JOIN PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST B ON A.PRJCT_ID = B.PRJCT_ID AND A.EMP_ID = B.EMP_ID AND A.APLY_YM = B.APLY_YM AND A.APLY_ODR = B.APLY_ODR WHERE B.PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST_SN = ( SELECT max(PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST_SN) FROM PRJCT_ATRZ_HIST C WHERE A.PRJCT_ID = C.PRJCT_ID AND A.EMP_ID = C.EMP_ID AND A.APLY_YM = C.APLY_YM AND A.APLY_ODR = C.APLY_ODR ) ) T2 ON T1.PRJCT_ID = T2.PRJCT_ID AND T1.EMP_ID = T2.EMP_ID AND T1.APLY_YM = T2.APLY_YM AND T1.APLY_ODR = T2.APLY_ODR AND T1.APLY_YM = #{aplyYm} AND T1.APLY_ODR= #{aplyOdr} GROUP BY T1.PRJCT_ID , T1.EMP_ID , T1.APLY_YM , T1.APLY_ODR, T2.ATRZ_DMND_STTS_CD ) CC ON CC.EMP_ID = AA.EMP_ID WHERE 1=1 AND AA.HDOF_STTS_CD = 'VTW00301'
AND AA.EMP_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empId}, '%')
